compliant.section: This policy mentions "the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)" and acknowledges its relevance.
compliant.legal provisions: This is good practice, as per Article 24, but not a specific requirement of the GDPR.

compliant.section: The policy lists the types of personal data collected.
compliant.legal provisions: The GDPR requires data controllers to provide information about the categories of personal data processed (Article 13 & 14).

compliant.section: The policy lists the purposes for which personal data is collected and used.
compliant.legal provisions: The GDPR requires data controllers to provide information about the purposes of the processing (Article 13 & 14).

compliant.section: The policy mentions obtaining consent for personal data collection.
compliant.legal provisions: Consent is one of the legal bases for processing (Article 6), and the GDPR sets out specific requirements for obtaining valid consent (Article 7).

non_compliant.section: The policy does not explicitly state the legal basis for each processing purpose.
non_compliant.legal provisions: The GDPR requires data controllers to identify the legal basis for processing and to inform data subjects of this basis (Articles 6, 13, & 14).
non_compliant.amend: For each purpose listed under "Purpose of Personal Data Collection/Use," specify the legal basis for processing (e.g., consent, contract performance, legal obligation, legitimate interests).

non_compliant.section: The policy does not mention data subject rights.
non_compliant.legal provisions: The GDPR grants data subjects various rights, including the right to access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, and data portability (Articles 12-23). The policy should clearly explain these rights.
non_compliant.amend: Add a section detailing the rights of data subjects under the GDPR, including how they can exercise these rights.

non_compliant.section: The policy does not mention data retention periods.
non_compliant.legal provisions: The GDPR requires data to be kept for no longer than necessary for the purposes for which it was processed (Article 5(1)(e)).
non_compliant.amend: Specify the retention periods for each category of personal data or explain how these periods are determined.

non_compliant.section: The policy does not mention data transfers outside the European Economic Area (EEA).
non_compliant.legal provisions: If Wiwynn transfers personal data outside the EEA, the policy must address this and explain the safeguards in place to protect the data (Articles 44-50).
non_compliant.amend: If applicable, add a section explaining the circumstances under which personal data may be transferred outside the EEA and the safeguards in place to ensure an adequate level of protection.

non_compliant.section: The policy does not mention the contact details of the data protection officer (DPO), if one has been appointed.
non_compliant.legal provisions: If a DPO is required or has been appointed, the policy should provide their contact details (Articles 37-39).
non_compliant.amend: If applicable, provide the contact details of the DPO.
